html:
2025-0976
2025-12-18FINCustoms TariffSurtax on Imports of Certain Steel Goods Remission Order, 2025Surtax on Imports of Certain Steel Goods Remission Order, 2025 in order to (1) provide remission of the 50 percent surtax for eight types of steel goods imported for which there are no identified domestically produced alternatives; and (2) provide remission of the 50 percent surtax for steel goods in transit from non-free trade agreement partners on or before August 1, 2025.Registration: SOR/2025-0287 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
subject: Surtax on Imports of Certain Steel Goods Remission Order, 2025
precis: Surtax on Imports of Certain Steel Goods Remission Order, 2025 in order to (1) provide remission of the 50 percent surtax for eight types of steel goods imported for which there are no identified domestically produced alternatives; and (2) provide remission of the 50 percent surtax for steel goods in transit from non-free trade agreement partners on or before August 1, 2025.
